recipe.title: Mango-berry Avocado Baby Food (9+ Months) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: water, can use breast milk or formula

steps.step: Add avocado, blueberries, mango, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor. Blend very well.
Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add avocado, blueberries, mango, and water, breast milk, or formula to a blender or food processor.
Refrigerate up to 3 days or freeze up to 1 month.
NOTE: Check with your pediatrician before introducing new foods to children under 12 months.
